mapper.insert: insert into basic_inf_mng ( idx, sal_name, sal_sno, meta_tag, kakao_open_url, phone_no, oder_name, first_phone_no, telegram_id, email, bank_acc_1, bank_acc_2, bank_acc_3, bank_acc_4, admin_id, reg_dttm ) values ( #{idx }, #{salName }, #{salSno }, #{metaTag }, #{kakaoOpenUrl}, #{phoneNo }, #{oderName }, #{firstPhoneNo}, #{telegramId }, #{email }, #{bankAcc1 }, #{bankAcc2 }, #{bankAcc3 }, #{bankAcc4 }, #{adminId }, now() )
